member.name: T:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationEmailExtensions
member.summary: Adds the WriteTo.Email() extension method to .

member.name: M:Serilog.LoggerConfigurationEmailExtensions.Email(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,System.String,System.String,System.String,Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.IFormatProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a sink that sends log events via email.
member.param: The logger configuration.
The email address emails will be sent from
The email address emails will be sent to
A message template describing the format used to write to the sink. the default is "{Timestamp} [{Level}] {Message}{NewLine}{Exception}".
The minimum log event level required in order to write an event to the sink.
The maximum number of events to post in a single batch.
The time to wait between checking for event batches.
Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.
The subject used in error mails
member.returns: Logger configuration, allowing configuration to continue.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo
member.summary: Connection information for use by the Email sink.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.DefaultPort
member.summary: The default port used by for SMTP transfer.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.DefaultSubject
member.summary: The default subject used for email messages.

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs the with the default port and default email subject set.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.NetworkCredentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the credentials used for authentication.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port used for the connection. Default value is 25.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.FromEmail
member.summary: The email address emails will be sent from.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.ToEmail
member.summary: The email address(es) emails will be sent to. Accepts multiple email addresses separated by comma or semicolon.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.EmailSubject
member.summary: The subject to use for the email.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.EnableSsl
member.summary: Flag as true to use SSL in the SMTP client.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.MailServer
member.summary: The SMTP email server to use.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo.IsBodyHtml
member.summary: Sets whether the body contents of the email is HTML. Defaults to false.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailSink.DefaultBatchPostingLimit
member.summary: A reasonable default for the number of events posted in each batch.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailSink.DefaultPeriod
member.summary: A reasonable default time to wait between checking for event batches.

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailSink.#ctor(Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailConnectionInfo,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan,Serilog.Formatting.ITextFormatter)
member.summary: Construct a sink emailing with the specified details.
member.param: Connection information used to construct the SMTP client and mail messages.
The maximum number of events to post in a single batch.
The time to wait between checking for event batches.
Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailSink.SendCompletedCallback(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
member.summary: Reports if there is an error in sending an email

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.Email.EmailSink.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Free resources held by the sink.
member.param: If true, called because the object is being disposed; if false, the object is being disposed from the finalizer.

member.summary: Emit a batch of log events, running asynchronously.
member.param: The events to emit.
